│ Export Conversation                                                                                                  │
│                                                                                                                      │
│ Select export method:                                                                                                │
│                                                                                                                      │
│ ❯ 1. Copy to clipboard  Copy the conversation to your system clipboard                                               │
│   2. Save to file       Save the conversation to a file in the current directory                                     │
│                                                                                                                      │

  esc to cancel
